Body: Description: We reactivated our license and noticed that the Mac modules are inactive, and the Mac policies are not being applied to the Mac endpoints. We need your support ASAP!!

What We've Learned Updated: 05/05/2025 
Client reactivated their license but now the modules for MAC OS are not active, only the ones for Windows

Next Steps Updated: 05/05/2025 
Will need to get this with CS.
